title: Rascal The Dragon
description: Real books for beginnersOne day a boy called Ben meets a stray dragon called Rascal. Ben and Rascal want to stay together. Ben's dad says no, but somehow Rascal the dragon always gets what Rascal the dragon wants...This is the first book in the bestselling and critically acclaimed Rascal series. Read a Rascal story to your children and before long they'll read it to you.
author: Paul Jennings
